description: This map covers the recreational terrain close to Calgary, from Sibbald Flats through Elbow Valley down to Sheep Valley. Popular hiking and biking trails covered include: Elbow Falls, Prairie Mountain, Fullerton Loop, Moose Mountain, Sulphur Springs, Nihahi Ridge, Powderface Ridge, Jumpingpound Ridge, Cox Hill, Sheep River Falls, Volcano Ridge, Ole Buck Loop and Deer Ridge. The back of the map includes trail descriptions and photos of various day hikes and mountain bike rides.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Bragg Creek  & Sheep Valley Map 7th Edition
